DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determinate whether application electric current produce change excitability alpha moto neurone . Moreover evidence whether effect electric current change tone muscle stimulation healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Modulation H-reflex After Application Electric Currents Healthy People
DOC.detailed_description: In last year several experimental study evidence transcutaneous electric nerve stimulation ( TENS ) peripheric application cause decrease spasticity modulation H-reflexes . But application central nervous system result different . So purpose study quantify modulation excitability alpha moto neurone application current central nervous system compare sham group .
DOC.criteria: Participants volunteer healthy student Physiotherapy , University Castilla La Mancha , old 18 year . Neuromuscular disease Epilepsy Trauma , surgery pain affect upper limb , shoulder girdle cervical area Osteosynthesis material upper limb Diabetes Cancer Cardiovascular disease Pacemaker implant electrical device Take drug ( NSAIDs , corticosteroid , antidepressant , analgesic , antiepileptic , ... ) study previous 7 day . Presence tattoo external agent introduce treatment assessment area . Pregnancy Sensitivity disturbance low limb
